summary: REQ-11 appears implemented by updating the centralized HERO_IMAGE_SRC constant to point away from the v2 hero image and back to /assets/generated/product-hero.dim_1600x1200.png. No evidence in the diff summary suggests the Hero component was hardcoded or that landing layout/theme was changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/docs files (frontend-file-summaries.txt) unrelated to the requested hero image revert.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change HERO_IMAGE_SRC to the prior user-provided image; updating summary files is not mentioned.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state tracking file (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested hero image revert.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changing project state/versioning metadata.
